turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hmm, I am hungry for some pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like information about the pizzerias near you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please I am starving.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I have found a Dominos and Papa Johns near your location. Which one would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ehh those are really mainstream, any other options?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I have found an Italian Pie about 10 minutes from your location.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that sounds really good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need 2 different pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, what customizations would you like on the first pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A large pepperoni pizza with Extra Cheese and Bacon bits.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any sauces with that ?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I have your first pizza ready to order. How abgout the second one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes I want an other Large but this time I want Spinach and Alfredo Sauce, With Roma tomatoes on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Any special sauces ?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nah I am good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, I have a pizza order at Italian Pie for 1 Large Pepperoni Pizza with Extra Cheese and Bacon, and one Large Spinach and Alfredo Sauce pizza with Tomatoes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that sounds correct. Can you place the order for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, the order has been placed and will be prepared in about 25 minutes. Your reciept has been emailed to you for ease of access.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay thank you.
